QuestData.Title: Find the Ancient Hero
QuestData.Description: Quickly, $n, head southwest to the Halls of the Ancestors!$B$BWithin you will find slumbering mjordin. Wake them until you find Iskalder. When you do, use this amulet upon him and bring him back to me.$B$BNow go. There is no time to waste!
QuestData.LogDescription: The Bone Witch at Njorndar Village wants you to return with Iskalder.
QuestData.CompletionText: Where is the ancient hero?$B$BWe do not have time to chat. Go to the Halls of the Ancestors and find him before it is too late!
QuestData.RewardText: He's a fine specimen and will serve us well.$B$BNow, we have to make sure to use him properly to trap Vardmadra!

Objectives.Objective: Iskalder delivered to The Bone Witch
